name: W A T E R W O R L D
name_original: W A T E R W O R L D
description: Put on your VR goggles and jump in. Welcome to a little pocket of the ocean! Explore the environment, find unique items, and don't forget to say hi to the fish.  They're friendly.  I promise.  Scale the ocean cliffs using a handmade climbing system, and if you're brave, sink to the bottom all the way from the top... If you want to relax, sit down and enjoy the sound of the ocean and the reflection of the light, a handmade water caustic light function.  Smooth seas!
